Description:
The Security Update for SQL Server 2017 RTM CU31 is now available for download at the Microsoft Download Center and Microsoft Update Catalog sites. This package cumulatively includes all previous security fixes for SQL Server 2017 RTM CUs, plus it includes the new security fixes detailed in the KB Article.

- Security Bulletins:
- [CVE-2025-49759 - Security Update Guide - Microsoft - Microsoft SQL Server Denial of Service Vulnerability](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmsrc.microsoft.com%2Fupdate-guide%2Fvulnerability%2FCVE-2025-49759&data=05%7C02%7Charveymora%40microsoft.com%7Ca24e26383db748e58d6d08ddd69188fc%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638902642735302161%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=e1lvdjzGcj4GYAFDX72eTxCr4F%2FQKEi6eOBFwcD5s6Y%3D&reserved=0)
- Security Update of SQL Server 2017 RTM CU31 KB Article: [KB5063759](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fkb%2F5063759&data=05%7C02%7Charveymora%40microsoft.com%7Ca24e26383db748e58d6d08ddd69188fc%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638902642735323648%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=58ZVVUZqOoTIJ7YN9SjzERhTL1EmomuBqeXuyz1x8Ss%3D&reserved=0)
- Microsoft Download Center: [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=108331](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=108331)
- Microsoft Update Catalog: [https://www.catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=5063759](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.catalog.update.microsoft.com%2FSearch.aspx%3Fq%3D5063759&data=05%7C02%7Charveymora%40microsoft.com%7Ca24e26383db748e58d6d08ddd69188fc%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638902642735356660%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=pzeUzfPNhKJ%2B1wnIyICtJEUYuxGzy0CTbGrZYh%2BqTHw%3D&reserved=0)
- Latest Updates for Microsoft SQL Server: [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/troubleshoot/sql/releases/download-and-install-latest-updates](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Ftroubleshoot%2Fsql%2Freleases%2Fdownload-and-install-latest-updates&data=05%7C02%7Charveymora%40microsoft.com%7Ca24e26383db748e58d6d08ddd69188fc%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638902642735373226%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rkxNkyw47%2FTuBWy%2FFXS7N2JhsMgUOP4pcfSnKofwgPc%3D&reserved=0)
